name: Acolyte
summary: Temple service grants you aid and shelter among worshipers.
description: You were raised in service to a temple dedicated to a god of good standing. Fellow worshipers will provide you with free healing and care, and you can rely on the support of those who share your faith.
equipment: A holy symbol, a prayer book or prayer wheel, 5 sticks of incense, vestments, common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 15 gp

name: Criminal
summary: Underworld ties let you send and receive illicit messages.
description: You are experienced in illicit dealings and have a reliable and trustworthy contact who acts as your liaison to a network of other criminals.
equipment: A crowbar, a set of dark common clothes with a hood, and a belt pouch containing 15 gp

name: Folk Hero
summary: Common folk shelter you thanks to heroic deeds in your past.
description: You come from the ranks of the common folk, yet your heroic deeds have made you a hero of the people. You can always find a place to hide, rest, or recuperate among commoners.
equipment: A set of artisan's tools, a shovel, an iron pot, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 gp

name: Noble
summary: Born to wealth, you command respect among the upper class.
description: You understand wealth, power, and privilege. People are inclined to think the best of you, and you can secure audiences with local nobility.
equipment: A set of fine clothes, a signet ring, a scroll of pedigree, and a purse containing 25 gp

name: Sage
summary: Years of study tell you where to find esoteric lore.
description: You spent years learning the lore of the multiverse. When you attempt to learn or recall a piece of lore, you know where and from whom you can obtain it.
equipment: A bottle of ink, a quill, a small knife, a letter from a dead colleague posing a question you have not yet been able to answer, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 gp

name: Soldier
summary: Former rank earns respect from soldiers and veterans.
description: War has been your life for as long as you care to remember. You have a military rank from your career that you can leverage with other soldiers.
equipment: An insignia of rank, a trophy taken from a fallen enemy, a set of bone dice or deck of cards, a set of common clothes, and a pouch containing 10 gp
